LOGIN.TITLE: MyETPWallet - THE NEW REALITY
LOGIN.INFO_TEXT_BROWSER: Notice for existing MVS wallet users: On your first login to myetpwallet.com, please create a wallet file from your backup words and then open the wallet from the file.

MESSAGE.LOADING_FAILED: Unable to sync latest news from server.

CREATE_WALLET.TITLE: Create new Wallet
CREATE_WALLET.LIGHT_WALLET_INFO_TEXT: Please be aware that myetpwallet.com does not have access to your wallet keys. If you lose your backup words or key file, we will not be able to grant access to your funds.
CREATE_WALLET.BACKUP_WORDS_WRITE_DOWN_TEXT: Please write down the following 24 words on a piece of paper. You will need them in order to retrieve the wallet. It's very important that you keep them safe and private. Don't show them to someone.

CONFIRM_BACKUP.TITLE: Warning
CONFIRM_BACKUP.TEXT: Confirm that you have written down your backup words

BUTTON.YES: Yes, I have made a backup

SELECT_PASSPHRASE.TITLE: Select passphrase
SELECT_PASSPHRASE.TEXT: We advise you to use a strong password for your own security.

ERROR.MINLENGTH: Passphrase must have a minimum length of {{requiredLength}}.
